name: The Traffic Must Flow
description:
Tired of all the traffic jams, one citizen takes matters into their own hands. Gently persuade the traffic flow with your explosives.

Made by Smada8 for New Years 5 Hour Jam 2019-2020.

Made using Clickteam Fusion 2.5

Controls:

Movement - Arrow Key
Bombs - Z
Run into cars to push them around
